summary: Bratislava is Slovakia's capital and largest city, located on the Danube River. With a population of around 475,000, it is a culturally rich place with a diverse history. Once known as Pressburg and Pozsony, it was an essential center for the Kingdom of Hungary. Today, it is Slovakia's political and economic hub, home to the president and parliament. The city has many universities, museums, and theaters. Bratislava is also a popular tourist destination, attracting visitors from nearby countries.
title: Bratislava
